attributes.action: Have a general election to break the remainer foothold on parliament.
attributes.additional_details: There was a majority vote to leave and a majority in the commons to remain I don’t see anyway of breaking the deadlock otherwise!
attributes.background: For 3.5 years we have had nothing but debate and delay with no outcome. We are sick of it and would like the house to do it’s job that it’s paid handsomely for and obey it’s duty to the people! You are paid to enact our will which can clearly not be carried out with the current remain majority
